StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerPersonView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @star.ngRow int = 1, @PageSize int = 15, @FirstName varchar(20) = null, @LastName varchar(20) = null, @SSN varchar(9) = null )
AS
SET ARITHABORT ON;
--This will return one more row that they asked for so that they know if there is another page of data. DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @star.ngRow + @PageSize
DECLARE @Sor.ngTable TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, NWA_ID INT NOT NULL, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT NULL, SSN CHAR(9) NULL, RS varchar(100) NULL, RSS varchar(100) NULL, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, LAST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, SUFFIX VARCHAR(5) NULL, Status VARCHAR(40) NULL, StatusCode VARCHAR(10) NULL, Disposi.on VARCHAR(40) NULL, [Date] DateTime, [Type] char(1))
DECLARE @Grid TABLE ( RowNumber int not null, NWA_ID INT NOT NULL, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID INT NULL, SSN CHAR(9) NULL, RS varchar(100) NULL, RSS varchar(100) NULL, FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, MIDDLE_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, LAST_NAME VARCHAR(40) NULL, SUFFIX VARCHAR(5) NULL, Status VARCHAR(40) NULL, StatusCode VARCHAR(10) NULL, Disposi.on VARCHAR(40) NULL, [Date] DateTime, [Type] char(1))
INSERT INTO @Sor.ngTable (RowNumber, NWA_ID, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, SSN, RS, RSS, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), NWA_ID, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, null, null, FIRST_NAME, LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dbo.PERSON p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN NWA n on p.Person_ID = n.Marine_Candidate_ID WHERE (@FirstName is null OR FIRST_NAME like @FirstName) AND (@LastName is null OR LAST_NAME like @LastName) AND (@SSN is null OR SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER like @SSN)
INSERT INTO @Grid SELECT * FROM @Sor.ngTable WHERE RowNumber >= @star.ngRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow
UPDATE @Grid SET n.[Type] = cns.STATUS_Type, n.Status = cns.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, n.StatusCode = cns.STATUS_CODE, n.Disposi.on = cns.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, n.Date = cns.Status_e.ec.ve_date FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN USMC.vwCurrentNwaStatus cns on n.NWA_ID = cns.NWA_ID
UPDATE @Grid SET n.RS = case when n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID != 910 then rs.[name] when n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = 910 then rss.[short_name] end , n.RSS = rss.[Name] FROM @Grid n INNER JOIN Recrui.ng_Organiza.on rss on n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = rss.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP om ON rss.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION rs ON om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = rs.ORGANIZATION_ID
SELECT RowNumber, NWA_ID, ISNULL(FIRST_NAME, '') as FIRST_NAME, ISNULL(MIDDLE_NAME, '') as MIDDLE_NAME, ISNULL(LAST_NAME, '') as LAST_NAME, ISNULL(SUFFIX, '') as SUFFIX, ISNULL(SSN, '') as SSN, ISNULL(RS, '') as RS, ISNULL(RSS, '') as RSS, ISNULL(Status, '') as Status, ISNULL(StatusCode, '') as StatusCode, ISNULL(Disposi.on, '') as Disposi.on, [Date], [Type] FROM @Grid
